notes.text: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities caused by processing specially crafted .pm3 files may allow remote code execution.CVE-2018-8833 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 6.3 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:L/I:L/A:L).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary

remediations.details: Additional mitigation guidance and recommended practices are publicly available in the ICS-CERT Technical Information Paper, ICS-TIP-12-146-01B--Targeted Cyber Intrusion Detection and Mitigation Strategies, that is available for download from the ICS-CERT website.
